vernac_cmds: Definition Fn_set (F : Setoid) (n : Nat) : SET := seq n F.
Let Fn_plus_fun : forall (F : sgroup) (n : Nat), Fn_set F n -> Fn_set F n -> Fn_set F n.
apply (Build_Map (Ap:=fun i : fin n => x i +' y i)).
Definition Fn_plus : forall (F : sgroup) (n : Nat), law_of_composition (Fn_set F n).
Lemma Fn_plus_associative : forall (F : sgroup) (n : Nat), associative (Fn_plus F n).
Definition Fn_sgroup (F : sgroup) (n : Nat) : SGROUP := Build_sgroup (Build_sgroup_on (Fn_plus_associative (F:=F) (n:=n))).
Lemma Fn_plus_commutative : forall (F : abelian_sgroup) (n : Nat), commutative (Fn_plus F n).
Definition Fn_absgp (F : abelian_sgroup) (n : Nat) : ABELIAN_SGROUP := Build_abelian_sgroup (Build_abelian_sgroup_on (A:=Fn_sgroup F n) (Fn_plus_commutative (F:=F) (n:=n))).
Definition Fn_zero : forall (F : monoid) (n : Nat), Fn_sgroup F n.
apply (Build_Map (Ap:=fun i : fin n => zero F)).
Lemma Fn_zero_is_r_unit : forall (F : monoid) (n : Nat), unit_r (sgroup_law_map (Fn_sgroup F n)) (Fn_zero F n).
Lemma Fn_zero_is_l_unit : forall (F : monoid) (n : Nat), unit_l (sgroup_law_map (Fn_sgroup F n)) (Fn_zero F n).

Definition Fn_monoid (F : monoid) (n : Nat) : MONOID := Build_monoid (Build_monoid_on (A:=Fn_sgroup F n) (monoid_unit:= Fn_zero F n) (Fn_zero_is_r_unit (F:=F) (n:=n)) (Fn_zero_is_l_unit (F:=F) (n:=n))).
Lemma Fn_monoid_is_abelian : forall (F : abelian_monoid) (n : Nat), abelian_monoid_on (Fn_monoid F n).
Definition Fn_abmon (F : abelian_monoid) (n : Nat) : ABELIAN_MONOID := Build_abelian_monoid (Fn_monoid_is_abelian F n).
Let Fn_inv_fun : forall (F : group) (n : Nat), Fn_monoid F n -> Fn_monoid F n.
apply (Build_Map (Ap:=fun i : fin n => group_inverse F (v i))).
Definition Fn_inv : forall (F : group) (n : Nat), Map (Fn_monoid F n) (Fn_monoid F n).
Lemma Fn_inv_is_r_inverse : forall (F : group) (n : Nat), inverse_r (Fn_plus F n) (Fn_zero F n) (Fn_inv F n).
Lemma Fn_inv_is_l_inverse : forall (F : group) (n : Nat), inverse_l (Fn_plus F n) (Fn_zero F n) (Fn_inv F n).
Definition Fn_group (F : group) (n : Nat) : GROUP := Build_group (Build_group_on (group_inverse_map:=Fn_inv F n) (Fn_inv_is_r_inverse (F:=F) (n:=n)) (Fn_inv_is_l_inverse (F:=F) (n:=n))).
Lemma Fn_group_is_abelian : forall (F : abelian_group) (n : Nat), abelian_group_on (Fn_group F n).
Definition Fn_abgp (F : abelian_group) (n : Nat) : ABELIAN_GROUP := Build_abelian_group (Fn_group_is_abelian F n).
Definition Fn_scmult_fun : forall (F : ring) (n : Nat), F -> Fn_set F n -> Fn_set F n.
apply (Build_Map (Ap:=fun i : fin n => c rX v i)).
Lemma Fn_scmult_fun_comp : forall (F : ring) (n : Nat) (c c' : F) (v v' : Fn_set F n), c =' c' in _ -> v =' v' in _ -> Fn_scmult_fun c v =' Fn_scmult_fun c' v' in _.
Let Fn_scmult_fun_map : forall (F : ring) (n : Nat), F -> MAP (Fn_set F n) (Fn_set F n).
apply (Build_Map (Ap:=fun v : Fn_set F n => Fn_scmult_fun c v)).
Let Fn_scmult_F_to_EndoSet : forall (F : ring) (n : Nat), Map (Build_monoid (ring_monoid F)) (Endo_SET (Fn_set F n)).
apply (Build_Map (Ap:=fun c : F => Fn_scmult_fun_map (F:=F) n c)).
Let Fn_scmult_sgroup_hom : forall (F : ring) (n : Nat), sgroup_hom (Build_monoid (ring_monoid F)) (Endo_SET (Fn_set F n)).
apply Trans with ((c rX c') rX Ap v i); auto with algebra.
Let Fn_scmult_monoid_hom : forall (F : ring) (n : Nat), monoid_hom (Build_monoid (ring_monoid F)) (Endo_SET (Fn_set F n)).
apply Trans with (one rX v i); auto with algebra.
Definition Fn_scmult : forall (F : ring) (n : Nat), operation (Build_monoid (ring_monoid F)) (Fn_abgp F n).
Lemma Fn_scmult_l_lin : forall (F : ring) (n : Nat), op_lin_left (Fn_scmult F n).
intros F n c c' v.
Lemma Fn_scmult_r_lin : forall (F : ring) (n : Nat), op_lin_right (Fn_scmult F n).
Definition Fn_mod (F : ring) (n : Nat) : MODULE F := Build_module (Build_module_on (Fn_scmult_l_lin (F:=F) (n:=n)) (Fn_scmult_r_lin (F:=F) (n:=n))).
Definition Fn (F : field) (n : Nat) : VECSP F := Fn_mod F n:vectorspace F.
Fixpoint Kronecker (A : Setoid) (t f : A) (n m : Nat) {struct m} : A := match n, m with | O, O => t | S n', O => f | O, S m' => f | S n', S m' => Kronecker t f n' m' end.
Lemma Kronecker_case_equal : forall (A : Setoid) (t f : A) (n m : Nat), n =' m in _ -> Kronecker t f n m =' t in _.
induction n; induction m; auto with algebra; intros.
simpl in |- *; simpl in H; auto with arith.
Lemma Kronecker_case_unequal : forall (A : Setoid) (t f : A) (n m : Nat), ~ n =' m in _ -> Kronecker t f n m =' f in _.
intro p; red in H; apply H; simpl in p; simpl in |- *; auto with arith.
Definition Basisvec_Fn : forall (F : field) (n i : Nat) (H : i < n), Fn F n:Type.
apply (Build_Map (Ap:=fun j : fin n => match j with | Build_finiteT j' _ => Kronecker one (zero F) i j' end)).

command: apply (Build_Map (Ap:=fun i : fin n => x i +' y i)).
apply (Build_Map (Ap:=fun i : fin n => zero F)).
apply (Build_Map (Ap:=fun i : fin n => group_inverse F (v i))).
apply (Build_Map (Ap:=fun i : fin n => c rX v i)).
apply (Build_Map (Ap:=fun v : Fn_set F n => Fn_scmult_fun c v)).
apply (Build_Map (Ap:=fun c : F => Fn_scmult_fun_map (F:=F) n c)).
apply Trans with ((c rX c') rX Ap v i); auto with algebra.
apply Trans with (one rX v i); auto with algebra.
intros F n c c' v.
induction n; induction m; auto with algebra; intros.
simpl in |- *; simpl in H; auto with arith.
intro p; red in H; apply H; simpl in p; simpl in |- *; auto with arith.
apply (Build_Map (Ap:=fun j : fin n => match j with | Build_finiteT j' _ => Kronecker one (zero F) i j' end)).
